channel.title: Just started playing again
channel.description:
So I was bored, recovered an old Runescape account of mine, got membership and stood around admiring a few things and now I really don't know what to do skills wise. My skills are the following:
[IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm78/5frtgvhy/statsrs.jpg[/img]
And I don't have a lot of money, my total worth is:
[IMG]http://i293.photobucket.com/albums/mm78/5frtgvhy/worthrs.jpg[/img]
I only have a few barrows items (100) in the bank. What should I look into doing next, I was originally going for 99 attack I believe. Opinions please, I haven't played Runescape in a ton of time so I'm not really sure what has changed and what roads to take.
Only thing I've tried is dungeoneering and that is quite hard to train.

item.title: Just started playing again
item.dc:creator: @we_we_we_so_excited we we we so excited
item.description:
@we_we_we_so_excited wrote:

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:15, topic:389300”][quote author=we we we so excited link=topic=485219.msg3555985#msg3555985 date=1301882980]

70-80

Again, I’m not sure how much this will cost.

50-70 is only about 636,307 xp, if you use Dragon bones on a Gilded altar in a P.O.H, it will take around 2,530 Dragon bones to get that much experience. That is only 15.4M and will take two and a half hours to do.

You could also use Baby dragon bones, 6,070 would be enough for 50-70. It will cost 10.1M but it’s around an hour for 1k bones, so a lot longer.
[/quote]

Doing the same thing but with different bones will not take any longer than each other. He will just have to spend a little longer running back/forward to get his target.[/quote]For bones yes, but XP no.

Read full topic

You could also use Baby dragon bones, 6,070 would be enough for 50-70. It will cost 10.1M but it’s around an hour for 1k bones, so a lot longer.[/quote]

item.title: Just started playing again
item.dc:creator: @gnomez gnomez
item.description:
@gnomez wrote:

[quote=“Mendorphins, post:19, topic:389300”][quote author=gnomez link=topic=485219.msg3556218#msg3556218 date=1301915947]

Fuck everything everyone else said. Go play castle wars. U get some exp, and it’s fun.

what is this black magic that you speek of? i think you mean soul wars not castle wars?
[/quote]
You get XP for killing people.[/quote]
ah i thought he meant getting xp as a reward

item.title: Just started playing again
item.dc:creator: @we_we_we_so_excited we we we so excited
item.description:
@we_we_we_so_excited wrote:

Yeah, defender of Varrock for the zombies. If you go there you can pray and use the altar just upstairs to restore prayer.

Also, if you try bandits then yes, bring guthans to switch to when you’re low. You also need a god item like Zamorak cloak, also you could just afk with guthans.

Read full topic

item.title: Just started playing again
item.dc:creator: @Tom Tom
item.description:
@Tom wrote:

we we we so excited:

Armoured zombies, I did 99 all melee combat stats there. There are also Dagannoth at the light house, Giant spiders on the third floor of security stronghold.

Don’t you need to do a quest to get to armored zombies? I’m almost certain I’ve tried it before. I was training on ape toll monkeys before I believe, it was alright XP but it would be nice to go to a new training spot.

[quote=“xxlukexx, post:4, topic:389300”][quote author=TOMSCAPE BETA link=topic=485219.msg3555138#msg3555138 date=1301832778]

If you want to do dungeoneering, do it in a team. I did it solo to 60 (my massive mistake) but not boved.

It also depends on what you like doing… I love combat so i do slayer and shit.

Well I might actually go back to getting 99 attack, can anyone recommend me some good training methods if I do this?

I’ve just gotten 50 prayer thanks to Pure_
[/quote]

Monkeys on ape, bandits. They are the only places I know, I don’t play often any more.

I did 85-99defence with slayer[/quote]

Yeh, I take it should wear guthans for healing, or? (Assuming you’re talking about desert place)

Read full topic
